title: Free Champion Rotation not updating
body: I created an account on the NA server a few days ago, and have since gotten to level 10 on it. However, the weekly free champions have not updated - I am still stuck with MF, Illaoi, and the like. Is there something wrong with my client, as it's missed two weeks' worth of free champions.

replies.body: Im level 45 and im stuck with the second most recent rotation

Hey there, your account is still using the champion roster for new players.  Per our[ Champion guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion), you should see the normal rotation in another level.
I have the same issue. Is there a specific level that the rotation will change or? I'm currently lvl 10
Technically per the article, it should be after 10 so give it another level.
